forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High near 55F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this evening, becoming a steady rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers likely. It will be windy at times, especially early. Low 11C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers, a few thundershowers and gusty winds during the evening giving way to periods of light rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 8C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 47F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 58F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High around 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High near 60F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 62F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.
